title: Visual cliff research scenario set - DV

content.question: Which of the following is the dependent variable in this study?

choices.label: The percentage of infants who crawled over the perceived ledge
The total number of infants who participated
Whether the mother was present while each infant crawled on the plexiglass box
The plexiglass box that was used

content.answer: The percentage of infants who crawled over the perceived ledge

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
